target_name: 2025년까지 5세 미만의 발육부진 및 쇠약에 관한 국제 목표 달성을 포함하여 2030년까지 모든 형태의 영양 부족을 종식시키고 여성 청소년, 임산부, 수유여성 및 노년층의 영양상태 개선

en.target_name: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Prevalence of anaemia in women aged 15 to 49 years, by pregnancy status (percentage)
en.global_indicator_name: Prevalence of anaemia in women aged 15 to 49 years, by pregnancy status (percentage)
en.data_name: The anaemia prevalence in women aged 10 and over
en.indicator_definition:
Percentage of women aged 10-11 years with a haemoglobin concentration less than 11.5 g/dL,
women aged 12-14 years with a haemoglobin concentration less than 12 g/dL,
women aged 15 and over with a haemoglobin concentration less than 12 g/dL for non-pregnant women, and less than 11 g/dL for pregnant women.
en.statistics_name: Korea National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey
en.computation_calculations: Interviews with household members aged 1 and over nationwide
en.graph_title: The anaemia prevalence in women aged 10 and over
en.source_organisation_1: Division of Health and Nutrition Survey and Analysis, Bureau of Chronic Disease Prevention and Control, Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency
